parameters.content:
## Update these values in the Business Configuration node:

- **businessName**: Your business name for personalized responses
- **responseTone**: Customize AI response style (e.g., "professional and friendly", "casual and warm")
- **slackWebhookUrl**: Your Slack webhook for notifications
- **notificationEmail**: Email for urgent alerts

All sensitive data uses environment variables for security.

### üìä Google Sheets Configuration

**Required Sheet Name:** "Reviews"

**Required Headers (Row 1):**
- **Date** - Timestamp of review processing
- **Source** - Always "Google Business Profile"  
- **Rating** - Star rating (1-5)
- **Reviewer** - Customer display name
- **Review** - Full review text
- **AI Response** - Generated response suggestion
- **Review ID** - Unique Google review identifier

**üîó Service Account Permissions:**

Grant "Editor" access to your Google Sheets service account

**üõ†Ô∏è Google Business Review Monitor Setup Guide**

This workflow automatically monitors your Google Business Profile for new reviews and generates AI-powered response suggestions.

‚úÖ **Step 1: Connect Google Business Profile API**
- Create Google Cloud project and enable Business Profile API
- Set up service account credentials  
- Note your Business Account ID and Location ID
- Set environment variables: GOOGLE_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID, GOOGLE_BUSINESS_LOCATION_ID

‚úÖ **Step 2: Setup Google Sheets Integration**
- Create Google Sheet with "Reviews" sheet
- Add headers: Date, Source, Rating, Reviewer, Review, AI Response, Review ID
- Set environment variable: GOOGLE_SHEET_ID
- Ensure service account has edit access to the sheet

‚úÖ **Step 3: Configure Slack Notifications**
- Create Slack webhook in your workspace
- Set environment variable: SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL  
- Configure notification email: NOTIFICATION_EMAIL

‚úÖ **Step 4: Customize Business Settings**
- Update Business Configuration node with your business name
- Adjust response tone (professional, friendly, casual, etc.)
- Test the AI response generation with sample review data

**üß™Final Step: Test with Sample Data**
Trigger manually to verify all integrations work properly
